exemplars.name: Ant Colony Optimization (ACO)
exemplars.relevance: ACO is a classic stigmergy example, where artificial ants leave pheromone trails that guide routing decisions. This is highly relevant to network routing based on stigmergy.
exemplars.mechanism: Indirect communication via environment modification (pheromone trails) to guide collective behavior.

Explore how agents can indirectly communicate preferences through modifications to the network 'environment.' Iteratively refine your NATS-based Python solution, studying emergent routing behavior.
